resources.string: This is the sample for the AndroidAppUpdater library which is for notifying users about updates of the installed android applications. \nIf your app, for some reason, has suddenly deleted from the PlayStore, don\'t worry, you can provide you new app to the old users.
The library has totally created by the Kotlin language in the Android Studio which is 100% compatible with the Kotlin and Java applications. It contains a sample in both Kotlin and Java.
Open dialog to see localized dialog
